name: Online Proposal Appraisal JAVA(OPA-JAVA)
short_description: OPA-JAVA is a full-featured online proposal appraisal system suitable for end-to-end administration of proposal request, submission, appraisal, selection and budgeting process, through to reporting, report review, approval, dissemination, and discussion.
